message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <obj>, Only PICK if gripper is empty. PICK only the correct next item according to the recipe.
2) PUT <obj1> <obj2>. <obj1> can be one of the foods. <obj2> can be food, cutting_board, or table.
3) WAIT, do nothing.
Only one robot can PUT each round. You must PICK up an item before PUT. 
[Action Output Instruction]
Must first output 'EXECUTE
', then give exactly one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example#1: 'EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
NAME Dave ACTION PICK tomato
'
Example#2: 'EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PUT cheese tomato
'

[History]
== Round#0 ==
[Chat History]
[Chad]:
Dave, please PICK bread_slice1 from your side. I will WAIT for this round.

PROCEED
[Dave]:
Chad, I agree with your plan. I will PICK bread_slice1 from my side.

PROCEED
[Chad]:
Alright, Dave. I will WAIT this round while you PICK bread_slice1.

PROCEED
[Dave]:
EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
NAME Dave ACTION PICK bread_slice1
[Executed Action]
Chad: WAIT
Dave: PICK bread_slice1
== Round#1 ==
[Chat History]
[Chad]:
Dave, it seems I cannot reach the cheese from my side. I will PICK cucumber instead. Please PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting_board.

PROCEED
[Dave]:
Chad, I understand the situation. I will PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting_board, and you can PICK cucumber from your side.

PROCEED
[Chad]:
Alright, Dave. Let's execute our plan. I will PICK cucumber from my side while you PUT bread_slice1 on the cutting_board.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber
NAME Dave ACTION PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
[Executed Action]
Chad: PICK cucumber
Dave: PUT bread_slice1 cutting_board
== Current Round ==


You are a robot Chad, collaborating with Dave to make a [vegetarian_sandwich].
Food items must be stacked following this order: bread_slice1, cheese, cucumber, tomato, bread_slice2, where bread_slice1 must be PUT on cutting_board. 
You must stay on right side of the table! This means you can only PICK food from right side, and Dave can only PICK from the other side.
Only one robot can PUT at a time, so you must coordiate with Dave.

At the current round:
You can see these food items are on your reachable side:
bread_slice1: on cutting_board
tomato: on your side
ham: on your side
beef_patty: on your side
Your gripper is holding cucumber
Think step-by-step about the task and Dave's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) output PROCEED, if the plans require further discussion; 2) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
        

[Current Chat]
[Chad]:
Dave, I will PUT cucumber on bread_slice1. Please PICK cheese from your side.

PROCEED
[Dave]:
Chad, I agree with your plan. I will PICK cheese from my side while you PUT cucumber on bread_slice1.

PROCEED
You are Chad, your response is:

Alright, Dave. Let's execute our plan. I will PUT cucumber on bread_slice1 while you PICK cheese from your side.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION PUT cucumber bread_slice1
NAME Dave ACTION PICK cheese
